about.details:
Incorporated in 2003, H.M. Electro Mech Limited is an infrastructure firm specialising in turnkey projects, including supply, installation, testing, and commissioning of pumping machinery and providing comprehensive operation and maintenance services.

The company's core business includes electrification projects with Indian Railways, banks, and municipal corporations. It has also started EPC projects, which include laying cross-country pipelines and civil work for water supply projects such as water treatment plants, pump houses, diesel generators, panel rooms, instrumentation, and PLC-SCADA.

H.M. Electro-Mech has collaborated with other companies for the civil work portion of these EPC projects. Additionally, the company sell products such as pumps, pipes, transformers, and motors.

The company's clients include State Governments, Central Governments, Municipal corporations, the banking sector and educational institutes.

The company operates nationwide, handling projects in Rajasthan, Maharashtra, Madhya Pradesh, Karnataka, Punjab, and Chandigarh.

As of September 30, 2024, the Company had 37 permanent employees and 107 on contracts.

Competitive Strength

  • Provides end-to-end solutions for projects, starting from conceptualization to maintenance
  • Robust relationships with leading manufacturers and OEMs, facilitating competitive pricing and expedited delivery
  • Prompt decision-making process ensures swift project progression and responsiveness to client needs.
  • Experienced Management Team
  • The team swiftly mobilizes resources for emergencies.

faqs.question: What is the H.M. Electro Mech IPO?
faqs.answer:
H.M. Electro Mech IPO is a SME IPO of 3699200 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹27.74 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹75 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1600.

The IPO opens on January 24, 2025, and closes on January 28, 2025.

Cameo Corporate Services Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in H.M. Electro Mech IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in H.M. Electro Mech IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in H.M. Electro Mech IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in H.M. Electro Mech IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'H.M. Electro Mech IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: How to apply for H.M. Electro Mech IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in H.M. Electro Mech IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is H.M. Electro Mech IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for H.M. Electro Mech IPO will be done on Wednesday, January 29, 2025, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Thursday, January 30, 2025. Check the H.M. Electro Mech IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is H.M. Electro Mech IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The H.M. Electro Mech IPO listing date is on Friday, January 31, 2025.
